mdRecord.dcterms:title: Inspection return, Massachusetts Regiment, 1780 October 6
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Sprout, Ebenezer, -1805
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Inspection return. Troop inspection chart. This document was signed just 4 days after the execution of British spy John Andre. It is a table detailing 265 "rank and file"; 16 officers, 22 sergeants, 13 drum and fifers; lists the units' arms and ammo. The document shows the troop and arms strength during the American Revolution. Autograph document signed, 1 page; signed by Col. Ebenezer Sprout, Inspecting officer of the 12th Massachusetts and Capt. Silas Burbank, temporary commander.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States--History--Revolution, 1775-1783
